document.full_text: the california couple charged with abducting 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years pleaded guilty on thursday to kidnapping and sexual assault charges that carry life prison sentences.
document.title: jaycee dugard's kidnappers plead guilty in california
lines_and_colors: the california couple charged with abducting 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years pleaded guilty on thursday to kidnapping and sexual assault charges that carry life prison sentences.
